files.patch:
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@ android:
   components:
     - platform-tools
     - tools
-    - build-tools-23.0.2
+    - build-tools-23.0.3
     - android-23
     - extra-android-m2repository
 script:

@@ -13,4 +13,4 @@
  * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
  * limitations under the License.
  */
-defaultTasks 'lint', 'jacocoTestReport', ':testapp:assembleRelease', 'install'
+defaultTasks 'lint', 'jacocoTestReport', ':testapp:assembleRelease'

@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@ apply plugin: 'com.android.application'
 
 android {
     compileSdkVersion 23
-    buildToolsVersion "23.0.2"
+    buildToolsVersion "23.0.3"
 
     defaultConfig {
         applicationId "com.example.android.agera.basicsample"

@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@ apply plugin: 'com.android.application'
 
 android {
     compileSdkVersion 23
-    buildToolsVersion "23.0.2"
+    buildToolsVersion "23.0.3"
 
     defaultConfig {
         applicationId "com.example.android.agera.basicsamplewithoutcallbacks"

@@ -45,9 +45,9 @@ dependencies {
     compile "com.android.support:recyclerview-v7:$gradle.supportLibraryVersion"
     testCompile "org.hamcrest:hamcrest-library:1.3"
     testCompile 'junit:junit:4.12'
-    androidTestCompile 'com.android.support.test.espresso:espresso-core:2.2.1'
-    androidTestCompile 'com.android.support.test:runner:0.4.1'
-    androidTestCompile 'com.android.support.test:rules:0.4.1'
+    androidTestCompile 'com.android.support.test.espresso:espresso-core:2.2.2'
+    androidTestCompile 'com.android.support.test:runner:0.5'
+    androidTestCompile 'com.android.support.test:rules:0.5'
     androidTestCompile 'com.android.support:support-annotations:' + gradle.supportLibraryVersion
 }
